channel.title: Nukerune is a virus
channel.description: Don't download Nukerune, the client is a virus, the owner Pax Magenz will go through your computer files!! His server should be taken down!

item.title: Nukerune is a virus
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

We’ll look into this, thanks. In the mean time, anybody who has evidence, I would appreciate it if you PM it to another staff member or myself.

Read full topic

item.title: Nukerune is a virus
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:3, topic:520373”]I’m not one who usually has a huge go at those who try to help the community. I usually see it as a positive act because the intentions are usually positive. However, this one seems like your intentions are to discredit someone who you may have had an issue with. This is why the thread is going to cop a lot of negativity.[/quote]attempted defamation or not the mopar staff who are responsible for the SSP should investigate any reports.

Read full topic
